reviewText: I've seen this on YouTube several times. I wanted to really like it. However, the quality of the video was no better than what you see for free on YouTube. I would have expected that a "Professional" video would have been at a clearer resolution.
Always wanted this short video clip, If I can find away to make it into a single clip and use it as a screen saver

We played this video at our church on Veteran's Day.  Several people welled up as they watched it.  I had first seen it online, and was glad I got to purchase a copy of it.  The item arrived timely and as described.
We were shown this DVD at our retirement community. I wonder if there was a dry eye in the audience.  I ordered it for my family

This short movie is a sad but captivating story. As it describes two military men in the final years of their lives, leading a quiet life in a retirement home. Until one a little rivalry starts their lives again, and the two battle to see who has the most medals, and so on. It ends rather tragically...... Unfortunately the first time i saw the amazing movie was at my Dad's funeral. Overall i would completely recommend you to buy this movie for the service member in your life.

I shared this video at work as part of our Veterans Day celebration and it was the most amazing and impactful part of the celebration. You laugh and chuckle all the way until near the end and your emotions will overwhelm you in a very personal and touching manner.  A must see for veterans, families of veterans and everyday people.
Two proud and independent veterans combat each other at a senior retirement facility with their bravado.  Short and easy watch.  Just love it!
